howWorking.title: How we are working
howWorking.textCreateRequest: Create a request with the product you need. Add his photo, description and tags to him.
howWorking.textConsiderOffers: Find the one that suits you in the offer list.
howWorking.textBuyProduct: Discuss the purchase with the seller and purchase the product.
howWorking.textFindRequest: The directory displays requests that match your tags, using the filter, find the right one for you!
howWorking.offerYourProduct: Offer your product to the customer
howWorking.textOfferYourProduct: Add a product to the product catalog and offer it to the buyer.
howWorking.discussDeal: Discuss the details and close the deal
howWorking.textDiscussDeal: Discuss the deal with the buyer in the chat and complete it.
